This PR update all the needed dependencies to use agave v3.

There are CI tests not passing and they are explained with comments.

candidates.title: Release 0.5.0
`feat` : add PolicyV2 to include token mint address
candidates.body:
Issue - #11 
- [x] Add PolicyV2 to include token mints
- [x] Support Policy along with PolicyV2 so we dont add breaking change
- [x] impl methods for ZeroCopyLoad instead of declarations
- [x] cleanup few things and add feature flags

candidates.title: Change public API of policy store
candidates.body:
## Changes
- Update public API of policy store to use a config and attach the local set.
- Include changelog
- Correct readme for CLI

## Testing
- [X] Run the complete example

```
cargo run --example complete -- --config ./config.example.toml
```

candidates.title: Switch pinocchio and batch add/remove identities
candidates.body:
## Changes
- Switch to pinocchio for the program
- Zero-copy representation and manipulation of account data
- Batch add and remove of identities on the CLI
- Add close policy support to program, sdk, and CLI
